name: Forward Air Corporation
description: Forward Air Corporation is a leading provider of logistics and transportation services in North America. Founded in 1981 and headquartered in Greeneville, Tennessee, the company specializes in expedited ground transportation, air freight services, and logistics solutions. Forward Air operates through several segments, including Expedited Freight, which offers time-sensitive transportation services, and the Intermodal segment that provides containerized freight transport. The company is committed to delivering high-quality service, leveraging advanced technology and experienced personnel to ensure efficient operations. With a vast network of terminals and partnerships, Forward Air is well-positioned to serve a diverse range of industries, including retail, automotive, and healthcare. The company is dedicated to sustainability and seeks to minimize its environmental impact through innovative practices and efficient routing. Forward Air's mission is to provide reliable and flexible logistics solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers, enabling them to succeed in a competitive marketplace.
